QuestData.Title: Informing the Queen
QuestData.Description: <The dragon steward pulls your letter of introduction out of his sleeve.>$B$BYes... yes, I think that you are ready to see the queen now.$B$BWhen you are ready, speak to me again and I will see to it that one of these drakes delivers you safely to the top of the temple. You will need to present your letter in person to Queen Alexstrasza.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver your Letter of Introduction to Wyrmrest Temple to Alexstrasza the Life-Binder at Wyrmrest Temple.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is good to finally meet you in person, $n. I have known you since before you were born.
QuestData.RewardText: You are very courageous to bring us this information. I was beginning to wonder why the blue dragonflight had so boldly initiated an attack upon the temple itself. Now we know that they are using enormous amounts of the very magic they view as such a threat to Azeroth.$B$B<The queen shakes her head in seeming resignation.>$B$BHypocritical, but so be it. If Malygos will not come to his senses, we have no choice but to take action in response to their assault.
